students.intro: We offer rooms for students in the Lake Geneva region, available for short or long-term stays. These are usually shared with local residents, providing a unique cultural experience. Whether you need accommodation for a few months or longer, we have flexible options to suit your needs.
students.step-1: Give us your personal information, a description of you, as well as your accommodation wishes so we can find the best deal for you!
students.step-2: We find you hosts that best fit your criterias. Match or Pass!
students.step-3: We provide you with the leasing agreement. Fast and simple.
students.step-4: We want you to have the best experience arriving in Switzerland. We offer different solutions to make you feel at home as quickly as possible.
students.service-1: We provide high-quality, comfortable rooms designed specifically for students. Experience a great living environment that supports your academic success!
students.service-2: We carefully verify each host to ensure a safe and trustworthy living experience. Our detailed screening process guarantees that you stay with reliable and welcoming individuals. Your peace of mind is our top priority!
students.service-3: We offer flexible contract options to suit your unique needs as a student. Choose the plan that works best for your schedule and budget!
students.service-4: We accept a wide variety of payment methods for your convenience. Choose the option that works best for you!

hosts.intro: We offer a platform designed to help those looking for supplementary income by connecting them with the perfect roommateâ€”an international student. By sharing part of your home, you can earn a steady income while also creating a meaningful cultural exchange. Not only will you have the opportunity to meet someone who may speak your language or introduce you to a new culture, but you'll also enjoy the enriching experience of sharing great moments together.
hosts.text-announce: A multi-cultural journey that starts with you.
hosts.step-1: Give us your personal information, a description of you, as well as your criterias for hosting a student.
hosts.step-2: We find you students that best fit your criterias. Match or Pass!
hosts.step-3: We provide you with the leasing agreement. Fast and simple.
hosts.step-4: We want you to have the best experience with the student you're hosting. If you're willing, we can arrange a meetup when the student arrives at your place.
hosts.service-1: We are here to ensure you find the ideal roommate who not only provides a steady monthly income but also brings an enriching experience to your home. This service is especially beneficial for international students facing challenges in finding housing in Switzerland. By connecting with a compatible roommate, you can create a welcoming environment while enjoying the opportunity to meet interesting people and make new connections.
hosts.service-2: We carefully verify each student to ensure a safe and trustworthy living experience. Our detailed screening process guarantees that you stay with reliable students. Your peace of mind is our top priority!
hosts.service-3: We offer flexible contract options to suit your unique needs as a host. Choose the plan that works best for your schedule !
hosts.service-4: Depending on the contract you're choosing, you can use our platform to bill the student you're hosting.
